body_html:
@chenwc07 Very weird that it works on Titan X and doesn't work on Titan Xp...

Can you try running with CUDA_LAUNCH_BLOCKING=1 to make sure the error from _broadcast_coalesced is not an error that actually happened elsewhere but only surfaces at that call?
body_text:

Can you try running with CUDA_LAUNCH_BLOCKING=1 to make sure the error from _broadcast_coalesced is not an error that actually happened elsewhere but only surfaces at that call?
body:
@chenwc07 Very weird that it works on Titan X and doesn't work on Titan Xp...

Can you try running with CUDA_LAUNCH_BLOCKING=1 to make sure the error from _broadcast_coalesced is not an error that actually happened elsewhere but only surfaces at that call?
